subject: Order #SSN1985
description_text:
Hello,

I've made my order almost 2 weeks ago and still no updates regarding it's
delivery. About a week ago i've received notification that it was shipped,
but both provided tracking numbers show that nothing is shipping.

ALS01118259156 shows that package was returned to sender
ALS01116072164 shows that this tracking number has expired 96 days ago

Please investigate where my order is and when i will get it as i've
paid for expedited shipping.

Thanks
Sergei

conversations.body_text: Hi Sergey T.,     We are very sorry that your first package was returned due to special reasons. We will arrange re-delivery for you immediately. This is the logistics tracking link for your second package, which is already in customs clearance.   ALS01116072164 =JTE300318989939   https://www.sypost.net/search?orderNo=JTE300318989939
